title: Enthalpy of reaction to form solid Fe

content.description: Substance <math alttext="delta H naught sub f, in kilojoules per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>°</mi></mrow></msubsup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>(</mtext><mtext>kJ/</mtext><mtext>mol)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="F e 2 O 3, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Fe</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="negative 826" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>826</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="C O gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="negative 111" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>111</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="F e, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Fe</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="C O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="negative 394" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>394</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> Based on the information in the table above, which of the following expressions gives the approximate <math alttext="delta H naught " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> for the reaction represented by the following balanced chemical equation?
content.question: <math alttext="F e 2 O 3, solid, plus 3 C O gas, react to produce, 2 F e, solid, plus 3 C O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Fe</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>CO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>Fe</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="delta H naught, sub reaction, equals open bracket, 0 kilojoules per mole, plus negative 394 kilojoules per mole, close bracket, minus open bracket, negative 826 kilojoules per mole, plus negative 111 kilojoules per mole, close bracket." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>[</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>394</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mo>)</mo><mo>]</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>826</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>111</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta H naught, sub reaction, equals open bracket, negative 826 kilojoules per mole, plus 3 times negative 111 kilojoules per mole, close bracket, minus open bracket, 2 times 0 kilojoules per mole, plus 3 times negative 394 kilojoules per mole, close bracket." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>826</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>111</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mo>[</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>394</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext><mo>)</mo><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
